text: The Mad Adventures of Rabbi Jacob (, ) is a 1973 French Italian adventure comedy movie directed by Gérard Oury and stars Louis de Funès, Marcel Dalio, Suzy Delair, Claude Giraud, Renzo Montagnani, Xavier Gélin. It was distributed in the United States by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1973 adventure movies Category:1973 comedy movies Category:French adventure movies Category:French comedy movies Category:Italian adventure movies Category:Italian comedy movies
title: The Mad Adventures of Rabbi Jacob
